section_title: Consultative Group of Experts on Non-Annex I National Communications (CGE)
sentences: This issue (FCCC/SBI/2010/INF.2) was considered by the SBI plenary on 31 May.
It was then considered in the contact group co-chaired by Agyemang-Bonsu and Miyagawa.
On 9 June, the SBI adopted conclusions.

Key issues discussed included whether: all or only Annex II parties should be encouraged to provide financial resources to the CGE; the CGE should be responsive to, or take into consideration, current or future needs of non-Annex I countries and COP decisions; and to prioritize one or several of the mandates given to the CGE in the annex to decision 5/CP.15 (work of the CGE).
